entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
